title: Traits and Features
content: onger need Advantage to trigger Sneak Attack as long as you are within 1.5m of the target and don't have Disadvantage. Swashbuckler Lv 3 Prey's Scent Feature Your swarm deals additional damage to creatures marked by Hunter's Mark. Swarmkeeper lv 3 Mighty Swarm Feature Your swarm has grown stronger. The swarm's regular attack now deals 1d8 damage, its special attack has one additional feature, and teleporting with your swarm now also increases your Armour Class for the rest of the round.
